input:
Write an ad for the following product

Product: LangLang is an app that connects you to language teachers across the world.

Tone: informative, friendly

Audience: college students
sentences: LangLang is the perfect app for college students who want to learn a new language. With LangLang, you can connect with language teachers from all over the world, and get personalized instruction that will help you improve your language skills. With LangLang, you'll be able to learn a new language in no time!
Looking to learn a new language? LangLang is the perfect app for you! With teachers from all over the world, you'll be able to find the perfect tutor for your needs.
Looking to learn a new language? LangLang is the perfect app for you! Connect with language teachers from all over the world, and learn at your own pace.
